content:
I want to register with the HL7 server to publish my IG .Please help me
Thank you

There are two possibilities here. Did you want to take your guide through the HL7 standards process and get it adopted as a standard (which will often involve making changes in response to feedback and is only appropriate if your IG is intended to apply either globally or US-wide)? Or did you just want to publish your local IG under the fhir.org website?
